text: Pankaj Jaiswal (born 15 June 1992) is an Indian film producer, and owner of Next Entertainment. He has produced films including Ammaa Ki Boli, Saare Jahan Se Acha and Naa Hausla Harenge Hum. == Career == Jaiswal graduated from Somaiya college. In 2013, he started his career with the television serial Naa Hausla Harenge Hum on Doordarshan. He also produced the web series Saare Jahan Se Acha with Prakash Jha as a host. In 2019 He made his debut as a film producer with Ammaa Ki Boli. == Filmography == Film Year Notes Naa Hausla Harenge Hum 2015 Producer Saare Jahan Se Acha (TV series) 2018 Producer Ammaa Ki Boli 2019 Producer == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Indian movie producers
title: Pankaj Jaiswal
